snippet: The book, “Fifty Shades of Grey,” by an obscure author, E L James, has been described as “Mommy porn” and “Twilight” for grown-ups.
abstract: Fifty Shades of Grey, erotic novel by obscure author E L James, has found a rapt audience among women nationwide; book's small Australian publisher has had trouble printing copies fast enough to satisfy demand, as excitement spreads on Facebook and by word of mouth; Vintage Books has won an intense bidding war for the rights to re-release it in blockbuster fashion.
lead_paragraph: The book, “Fifty Shades of Grey,” by an obscure author, E L James, has been described as “Mommy porn” and “Twilight” for grown-ups.

headline.seo: An Erotic Novel, ‘50 Shades of Grey,’ Goes Viral With Women
headline.main: Discreetly Digital, Erotic Novel Sets American Women Abuzz
headline.print_headline: Discreetly Digital, Erotic Novel Sets American Women Abuzz
